summary: The DBZ Overhaul Mod(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12230) doesn\'t exactly make it super clear on how to get all the spells and such. This will add all the spells for you or the spelltomes easily.
descriptionHtml:
The DBZ Overhaul Mod(http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12230) doesn\'t exactly make it super clear on how to get all the spells and such. Figured I\'d make a couple text files you can use via the console once you\'ve modified them a little.

The XX can be found by looking at your Mod Load Order for the mods installed VIA the DBZ Overhaul mod. Change the XX\'s in the text file to the two Numbers or Letters in YOUR Load Order.

After that is done you\'ll be able to add those text files into your Skyrim/Data/ Folder and use these commands.

bat dbzhelp (Shows all the ID\'s)
bat dbzaddspells (Adds all the spells directly)
bat dbzaddtomes (Adds all the spell tomes)
bat dbzaddoutfit (Adds the Battle Gloves AND Goku\'s Outfit:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7205)
bat senzubean (Adds 5 Senzu Beans to your inventory)
author: Lyhome
